page.title: 06Events in Barrhead
page.content: We have three events each year which are of interest to our local community. As a large part of our area is farming land the main event of the year is the{agricultural}show.The Neilston Show has taken place since 1821 and is still as popular today.Local farmers exhibit their animals and there are competitions for baking,sewing and floral art. In June each year one of the local children is chosen as{Gala}Queen. She rides through the town on a decorated float on Gala day and presents the trophies for the different competitions which take place during Gala week. On the final day of Gala week{pipe {bands}from all over Scotland come to take part in the competitions.
